Package edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.thangiah.webrouting.controller.UserController
@Controller public class UserController extends Object
Handles the Thymeleaf controls for the pages dealing with Users.
Since:
1/30/2022
Author:
Logan Kirkwood llk1005@sru.edu

  • Constructor Details

    • UserController

      public UserController(UserRepository userRepository, RoleRepository roleRepository, CarriersRepository carriersRepository)
      Constructor for UserController.
      Instantiates the userRepository
      Instantiates the roleRepository
      Parameters:
      userRepository - Used to interact with the users in the database
      roleRepository - Used to interact with the roles in the database
      carriersRepository - Used to interact with the carriers in the database

  • Method Details

    • showUserList

      @RequestMapping("/users") public String showUserList(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds all of the users to the "userstable" model and redirects user to the users page.
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "users"

    • shownAddHomePage

      @RequestMapping("/signup") public String shownAddHomePage(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Redirects user to the /add/add-user-home page
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "/add/add-user-home"

    • showCarrierPage

      @RequestMapping("/addcarrieruser") public String showCarrierPage(User user, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Redirects user to the /add/add-user-carrier page.
      Adds instance of user to the userForm.
      Parameters:
      user - Stores information on the user being added
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "/add/add-user-carrier"

    • showOtherPage

      @RequestMapping("/addotheruser") public String showOtherPage(User user, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Redirects user to the /add/add-user page and displays all of the roles except for the CARRIER role as that is created on a separate page.
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      user - Used to the store the information on the user being added
      Returns:
      "/add/add-user"

    • addUserCarrier

      @RequestMapping("/addusercarrier") public String addUserCarrier(@ModelAttribute("userForm") User userForm, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model, String carrierName, String scac, String ltl, String ftl, String pallets, String weight)
      Adds a user with the CARRIER role to the database.
      Creates an instance of a carrier and associates it with the new user.
      Parameters:
      userForm - Information on the user being added
      bindingResult - Ensures the inputs from the user are valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      carrierName - Name of the carrier
      scac - SCAC code of the carrier
      ltl - Whether or not LTL is offered by the carrier
      ftl - Whether or not FTL is offered by the carrier
      pallets - Number of pallets a carrier can handle
      weight - Weight a carrier can handle
      Returns:
      "redirect:/users" or "/add/add-user-carrier"

    • addUser

      @RequestMapping("/adduser") public String addUser(@Validated User user, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a user to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the user is saved in the userService. and the user is redirect to /users
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /add/add-user page.
      Parameters:
      user - Information on the uesr being added
      result - Ensures the information given by the user is valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/users" or "/add/add-user"

    • deleteUser

      @GetMapping("/deleteuser/{id}") public String deleteUser(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a user using the id parameter and if found, redirects user to confirmation page Checks if there are dependencies and if so, user is not deleted and an error message is displayed to the user
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the user being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "/delete/deleteuserconfirm" or "users"

    • deleteUserConfirm

      @GetMapping("/deleteuserconfirmation/{id}") public String deleteUserConfirm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a user using the id parameter and if found, deletes the user and redirects to users page
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the user being deleted
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "redirect:/users"

    • showEditForm

      @GetMapping("/edituser/{id}") public String showEditForm(@PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Finds a user using the id parameter and if found, adds the details of that user to a form and redirects the user to that update form. Also adds the roles, and carriers to the form.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the user being edited
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "update/update-user"

    • updateUser

      @PostMapping("/updateuser/{id}") public String updateUser(@PathVariable("id") long id, @Validated User user, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model, boolean nocarrier)
      Updates a user to the database. Checks if there are errors in the form.
      If there are no errors, the user is updated in the userService. and the user is redirect to /users
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the /update/update-user page.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the user being updated
      user - Information on the user being updated
      result - Ensures inputs from the user are valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      nocarrier - Signifies if user is supposed to have a carrier associated with them
      Returns:
      "redirect:/users" or "/update/update-user"

    • showUserDetailsForm

      @GetMapping("/updateuserdetails") public String showUserDetailsForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Redirects user to the /update/update-user-details page.
      Adds details of currently logged in user to the form.
      Parameters:
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "/update/update-user-details"

    • updateDetails

      @RequestMapping("/updatedetails") public String updateDetails(@Validated User user, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates users username, password, and email. Sets role, shipments, carrier, and id to that of
      the currently logged in user.
      If there are errors, the user is redirected to the home page with an error message displayed.
      If there are no errors, the user is still redirected to the home page but with a message being displayed.
      Parameters:
      user - Stores information on the user being updated
      result - Ensures information entered by the user is valid
      model - Used to add data to the model
      Returns:
      "/index"

    • getLoggedInUser

      public User getLoggedInUser()
      Returns the user that is currently logged into the system.
      If there is no user logged in, null is returned.
      Returns:
      user2 or null
